Message.name: Attack target
Message.Invoke:
(block ((target (objGetTarget gSender))) (switch (eq target gSource) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'IcantAttackMyself)
(not target) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'NoTarget)
(not (objIsAngryAt target gPlayerShip)) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'IcantAttackFriends)
(block Nil (objSetData gSource "behavior" 'attackingTarget) (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'attack target) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'AttackTargetAck) ) ) )

Message.name: Form up
Message.Invoke:
(block (behavior) (setq behavior (objGetData gSource "behavior")) (switch (eq behavior 'escorting) (block Nil (objCommunicate gSource gSender 'FormUp) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'FormUpAck) )
(block Nil (objSetData gSource "behavior" 'escorting) (if (or (eq behavior 'attackingTarget) (eq behavior 'attackingAtWill)) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'CancelAttackAck) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'FormUpAck) )
(shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'follow gPlayerShip) ) ) )

Message.name: Status
Message.Invoke:
(block ( (behavior (objGetData gSource 'behavior)) (damageDesc (objGetProperty gSource 'damageDesc)) (shieldLevel (@ damageDesc 'shieldLevel)) (armorLevel (@ damageDesc 'armorIntegrity)) (hullLevel (@ damageDesc 'hullIntegrity)) )
(objSendMessage gSender gSource (switch (eq behavior 'goingHome) (objTranslate gSource 'StatusGoingHome)
(eq behavior 'repairingArmor) (objTranslate gSource 'StatusRepairingArmor)
(and hullLevel (ls hullLevel 100)) (objTranslate gSource 'msgHullDamage damageDesc)
(and armorLevel (ls armorLevel 100)) (objTranslate gSource 'msgArmorDamage damageDesc)
(and shieldLevel (ls shieldLevel 100)) (objTranslate gSource 'msgShieldDamage damageDesc)
(or (eq behavior 'attackingTarget) (eq behavior 'attackingAtWill)) (objTranslate gSource 'StatusAttackingTarget)
(eq behavior 'waiting) (objTranslate gSource 'StatusWaiting)
(objTranslate gSource 'Status100Percent) ) )
(objSetShowAsDestination gSource Nil 'autoclear) )

Message.name: Wait
Message.Invoke:
(block Nil (objSetData gSource "behavior" 'waiting) (objSendMessageTranslate gSender gSource 'WaitAck)
(shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'hold) )

Language.Text: %name% refuses to switch to an inferior ship.

Events.OnBehavior:
(block (behavior theTarget nextTime maxSystemLevel armorDamage) (setq behavior (objGetData gSource "behavior"))
(switch ; If we're injured and we're near a base that repairs armor then ; dock with the base and get repaired
(and (eq behavior 'escorting) (or (geq (setq armorDamage (objGetVisibleDamage gSource)) 10) (objGetCondition gSource 'radioactive) ) (not (objIsUnderAttack gSource)) ) (switch ; Some wingmen (like Jenna) doesn't want to proceed beyond a certain point (and (setq maxSystemLevel (objGetStaticData gSource "MaxSystemLevel")) (gr (sysGetLevel) maxSystemLevel) ) (block Nil (objSetData gSource "behavior" 'goingHome) (objSendMessageTranslate gPlayerShip gSource 'ImGoingHome)
(shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'hold 30) (shpOrder gSource 'gate (intGetGateToSystem gSource (objGetData gSource "homeSystem"))) )
; If there is a station that can repair armor, dock with it (setq theTarget (srvFindRepairArmor gSource 60 (itmGetLevel (shpGetArmor gSource 0)))) (block Nil (objSetData gSource "behavior" 'repairingArmor) (objSendMessageTranslate gPlayerShip gSource 'ImRepairingArmor)
(shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'dock theTarget) (shpOrder gSource 'wait (random 3 8)) )
; Otherwise, tell the player that we need repairs (and (geq armorDamage 50) (or (not (setq nextTime (objGetData gSource "nextArmorRepairMsg"))) (geq (unvGetTick) nextTime) ) ) (block Nil (objSendMessageTranslate gPlayerShip gSource 'MyArmorNeedsRepair) (objSetData gSource "nextArmorRepairMsg" (add (unvGetTick) 3600)) ) )
; If we're attempting to repair at a station that doesn't have enough free ports, go back to normal behavior. (and (eq behavior 'repairingArmor) (setq theTarget (shpGetOrderTarget gSource)) (ls (objGetOpenDockingPortCount theTarget) 1) (not (find (staGetDockedShips theTarget) gSource)) ; Have to check this way because the station knows the ship is docking ; once the port is reserved, but the ship doesn't consider itself docked yet. gPlayerShip ) (block nil (objSetData gSource 'behavior 'escorting) (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'follow gPlayerShip) )
(and (neq behavior 'goingHome) (eq (shpGetOrder gSource) 'gate) gPlayerShip ) (block ((message (cat "Warning: " (objGetName gSource) " was gating but not going home"))) (objSetData gSource 'behavior 'escorting) (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'follow gPlayerShip) (printTo 'log message) (plyMessage gPlayer message) )
) )
Events.OnDestroy:
(switch (= aDestroyReason 'removedFromSystem) Nil
(= (objGetCharacterData gSource 'status) 'returnedHome) Nil
(and gPlayerShip (eq aOrderGiver gPlayerShip)) (objSetCharacterData gSource 'status 'destroyedByPlayer)
(block Nil (objSetCharacterData gSource 'status 'destroyed) (plyMessage gPlayer (objTranslate gSource 'WingmanKilled)) ) )
Events.OnEnteredSystem:
(block (maxSystemLevel) (setq maxSystemLevel (objGetStaticData gSource "MaxSystemLevel")) (switch (not maxSystemLevel) Nil
(eq (objGetData gSource "homeSystem") (sysGetNode)) Nil
(geq (sysGetLevel) maxSystemLevel) (objSendMessageTranslate gPlayerShip gSource 'ImTooFarFromHome)
(eq (sysGetLevel) (subtract maxSystemLevel 1)) (objSendMessageTranslate gPlayerShip gSource 'ImFarFromHome) ) )
Events.OnOrdersCompleted:
(block (behavior) (setq behavior (objGetData gSource "behavior"))
(if (eq behavior 'repairingArmor) (block Nil (intArmorRepairAll gSource) (shpDecontaminate gSource)
; Remove any overlays that shouldn't be there (e.g., pteravores)
(enum (objGetOverlays gSource) theOverlay (objFireOverlayEvent gSource theOverlay 'OnRemoveAtDockServices) )
; Tell player what happened
(objSendMessageTranslate gPlayerShip gSource 'ArmorRepaired) ) )
; Set orders and state
(switch (not gPlayerShip) (block Nil (objSetData gSource 'behavior 'waiting) (shpOrder gSource 'hold) )
(and (eq behavior 'attackingAtWill) (intOrderBreakAndAttack gSource gPlayerShip Nil) ) Nil
; Default: return to formation. (block Nil (objSetData gSource 'behavior 'escorting) (shpOrder gSource 'follow gPlayerShip) ) ) )
Events.OnPlayerLeftSystem:
(block (behavior) (setq behavior (objGetData gSource "behavior")) (switch (or (not behavior) (eq behavior 'goingHome) ) Nil
; If we're waiting, stay in this system and wait for the player (or (eq behavior 'waiting) (eq behavior 'repairingArmor) ) 'waitForPlayer
; Otherwise, follow the player through the gate 'followPlayer ) )
Events.OnTranslateMessage:
(switch (eq aMessage 'EscortReportingIn) (if (not (objGetData gSource "welcomeMsg")) (block Nil (objSetData gSource "welcomeMsg" True) (objTranslate gSource 'WingmanJoined) ) "" )
(eq aMessage 'WatchYourTargets) (objTranslate gSource 'WatchYourTargets)
(eq aMessage 'NiceShooting) (objTranslate gSource 'NiceShooting)
Nil )
Events.OrderLeavePlayer:
(block Nil (objSetProperty gSource 'playerWingman Nil) (objSetData gSource "behavior" 'goingHome)
(shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'hold 30) (shpOrder gSource 'gate)
(objFireEvent gSource "OnWingmanLeftPlayer") )
Events.CanUpgradeTo:
; This event is called when the player wants to give the wingman ; a new ship. By default, we only accept if the new ship is ; better (cost more) than the old one.
(switch
; If the new ship is cheaper than this ship, then we do not ; allow the upgrade.
(leq (objGetProperty (@ gData 'newShipObj) 'price) (objGetProperty gSource 'price)) (objTranslate gSource 'msgRefusesToDowngradeShip { name: (objGetName gSource 0) })
; Otherwise, we allow it.
True )

(pageCount (rpgPageCount textDesc)) (pageNo (if (scrGetData gScreen 'curPage) (scrGetData gScreen 'curPage) 0)) (pageDesc (rpgPageDesc textDesc pageNo))
(actions (@ pageDesc 'actions)) (atLastPage (= pageNo (- pageCount 1)))
(nextActionID 0) )

; If we don't have a list of actions, then we auto-generate ; them based on variables on the page descriptor. (!= (typeof actions) 'list) (setq actions (list { label: (or (@ pageDesc 'label) (@ pageDesc 'nextLabel) (scrTranslate gScreen 'actionContinue)) nextPage: (or (@ pageDesc 'nextPage) 'nextPage) code: (or (@ pageDesc 'code) (@ pageDesc 'nextCode)) })) )
(enum actions actionDesc (block Nil (scrAddAction gScreen (cat "action" nextActionID) Nil (@ actionDesc 'label) Nil (switch (= (count (@ pageDesc 'actions)) 1) (list "default" "cancel") (= nextActionID 0) "default" (= nextActionID (- (count (@ pageDesc 'actions)) 1)) "cancel" Nil ) (lambda () (block ( (nextPage (or (@ actionDesc 'nextPage) (@ actionDesc 'nextPane))) ) (if (@ actionDesc 'code) ((@ actionDesc 'code)) )
(switch (not nextPage) (scrExitScreen gScreen)
(= nextPage 'exitScreen) (scrExitScreen gScreen)
(= nextPage 'forceUndock) (scrExitScreen gScreen 'forceUndock)
(= nextPage 'wingmanAccept) (scrShowPane gScreen "ReplyAccept")
(= nextPage 'wingmanDecline) (scrShowPane gScreen "ReplyDecline")
(block Nil (scrSetData gScreen 'curPage (if (= nextPage 'nextPage) (+ pageNo 1) (rpgFindIndexByID gData nextPage))) (scrShowPane gScreen "Intro") ) ) ) ) ) (setq nextActionID (add nextActionID 1)) ) ) )

Actions.Action:
(block ( (wingman (scrGetData gScreen 'wingman))
wingmanObj ) ; Create the wingman
(switch ; First ask the type to create it.
(setq wingmanObj (typFireEvent wingman 'OrderCreateShip { pos:(objGetPos gSource) status:'wingman })) Nil
; Otherwise, we assume the type is a ship class
(setq wingmanObj (sysCreateShip wingman gSource (typGetProperty wingman 'defaultSovereign))) )
; Order them to follow the player

TranscendenceModule.Globals:
(block Nil (setq intOrderBreakAndAttack (lambda (receiver sender acknowledge) (block (theTarget) (setq theTarget (or
; Get the closest angry target to the sender that the sender can detect. ; Store the result so we only have to check once each tick. (if (eq (unvGetTick) (objGetData sender 'closestTargetCheckTick))
(objGetData sender 'closestBreakAndAttackTarget)
(block Nil (objSetData sender 'closestTargetCheckTick (unvGetTick)) (setq theTarget (sysFindObject sender "sTYAPN N:100;")) (objSetData sender 'closestBreakAndAttackTarget theTarget) theTarget ) )
; If we're already attacking something, don't change target. (if (eq (shpGetOrder receiver) 'attack) (shpGetOrderTarget receiver) )
; Attack the closest target to ourself that we can detect, if any. (sysFindObject receiver "sTYAPN N:100;") ))
(switch (not theTarget) ; Nothing to attack. (if acknowledge (objSendMessageTranslate sender receiver 'NoTargetInRange))
(not (objMatches theTarget Nil 'stA)) (block ((message (cat "Warning: " (objGetName receiver) " tried to break and attack an inactive object: " (objGetName theTarget)))) (printTo 'log message) (plyMessage gPlayer message) (setq theTarget Nil) )
(block Nil (objSetData receiver 'behavior 'attackingAtWill) (if acknowledge (objSendMessageTranslate sender receiver 'AttackTargetAck)) (shpCancelOrders receiver) (shpOrder receiver 'attack theTarget) ) )
; Return the target theTarget ) )) )
